title: down again? Geez Riot
body: God save the server, and the company...

replies.body: We got word that Comcast had experienced a [service issue](http://forums.xfinity.com/t5/X1/TV-Service-Interruption-10-11-2016/td-p/2813767) last night for a few hours. They've resolved the issue by now, so if you're still having issues please let me know.
same here but my friend is still playing....

> [{quoted}](name=Delay No Moreee,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=soJEadxH,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-11T08:27:21.706+0000)

if your friend is using Win 10 ???
